QuestData.Title: More Crystal Fragments
QuestData.CompletionText: You've got more crystal fragments? Make sure you're not taking any that are still attached to the mountain; we wouldn't want to stir up trouble with the naaru.
QuestData.RewardText: Keep the crystal fragments coming, $N. We cannot let these thieves take our property.$B$BEven if it's not ours just quite yet. A technicality, of course.
